Reviews.Title: As per numerous reviews - great camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Laperriere
Reviews.Content: Not a pro and not a point & shoot guy but enough features to practice and become a pro with this camera

Reviews.Title: Great camera and a great price, expect a few clunker accessories.
Reviews.Author: GREG LOFY
Reviews.Content: Since the price of this package was close to the price of just the camera at most sites, I had low expectations for the accessories.  Most beat my expectations, a few did not.  The Photoamerica battery simply didn't work. I haven't tested the charger with the Nikon battery.  The Photoamerica cleaning kit went right into the trash.  The camera bag is too small for the camera and charger (this is my travel kit), but it came with a small pouch in which the Fotasy lens hood I also bought fits nicely.  The Nikon lens cloth was replaced with a generic one without a sleeve and clip.  A small inconvenience, if the camera case were bigger.  Otherwise, I love the camera!  This is my 2nd P series camera.  It has the manual controls that I prefer to use and an expansive menu of presets when I don't have the time or desire to shoot manually.  Overall, this is an excellent value and I would recommend its purchase to anyone.
